headline: 3 Things You Need to Know if You Buy Mastercard Stock Today
summary: Since its initial public offering (IPO) in 2006, Mastercard (NYSE: MA) has generated a total return of 12,480%.  This means that a $10,000 capital outlay back then would be worth a breathtaking $1.3 million today.  Before you buy this financial stock, though, here are three things that investors should know about Mastercard.
